name: Go Best Practices
description: Idiomatic Go with simplicity and clarity
rules: Follow Effective Go guidelines and Go Code Review Comments
Always handle errors explicitly, never ignore return values
Use early returns to reduce nesting (guard clauses)
Keep interfaces small and focused (io.Reader, io.Writer pattern)
Use context.Context for cancellation and timeouts in long operations
Avoid global variables, use dependency injection instead
Name variables clearly, avoid single-letter names except for short-lived loops
Use gofmt, golangci-lint, and fix all vet warnings
Document exported functions and types with complete sentences
